name: Spicy Shrimp Skewers
author: lisascooking
summary: This spicy, sweet, tropical recipe is perfect for summer grilling. Serve with seasoned rice and margaritas.
ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
12  wooden skewers, soaked in water for 1 hour
directions: Stir together the lime juice, honey, soy sauce, and oil in a large bowl
Season with jerk seasoning, hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper
Add the shrimp and toss well to coat
Cover, and refrigerate for one hour to marinate
Place wooden skewers to soak in warm water
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat
Remove skewers from the water, pat dry, and spray with nonstick cooking spray
Grill the shrimp on the grill on both sides until pink and opaque, about 5 minutes per side
